text: Attended by esther who went the extra mile to explain to me about the turmeric supplement.  Thank you ðŸ˜Š
Staff was not apologetic at all!! a simple sorry could have been given but instead decided to be defensive on the store missed labeled pricing even if customer is wrong!!!

I will give a no star if there's an option. The lady pharmacist was so impatient and roll her eyes when I was merely asking her a few questions about medication for sore throat which takes her less than 3 minutes. I would surely not patronise this store again.

Bad service. My wife went to do her refund and had to suffer sarcastic remarks by staff Jenny and Zhiying.

Especially Jenny, her repeated sarcastic remarks are very disrespectful when she merely just wanted to refund an item which is valid for a refund. Jenny should also improve on her attitude, customer service and knowledge to process refund.

Zhiying processed her refund, but before processing , she gave all kinds of reasons. Since she is the store in charge , she should know how to process the refund.

It's sad that the customer are treated this way. Really hope that the service will improve in the future.

First time we encountered such bad service in Singapore, hope there won't be a next time. Sigh..

I brought kids vitamin today and was about to paid at waterway point outlet and the cashier asked me if I have NTUC member card and ask me to slide myself on the card machine..but i hv difficuty in doing so no matter hw she guided me. Hence I ask her to help me...She gaves me a big "Sigh" infront of me. Is this the kind of service that a customer should received? She is chasing me away.
Please guide your worker to be helpful and patience moving forward!
